title: DATS data repository schema
description: A repository or catalog of dataset.

name.description: the name of the data repository

type.description: a descriptor (ideally from a controlled vocabulary) providing information about the nature of the datasets

scopes.description: Information about the nature of the datasets in the repository, ideally from a controlled vocabulary or ontology.

aggregatorOf.description: The DataRepositories aggregated by this repository. This property will be empty for primary repositories.

licenses.description: a property used to specify to the terms of use of the standard

version.description: an optional property used to specify a release point for the repository when applicable

publishers.description: a property used to specify the person(s) or organization(s) responsible for the repository
